testCase.name: VerseDetailPage loads audio when page is rendered
VerseDetailPage should load settings from AsyncStorage
VerseDetailPage should load latin false
VerseDetailPage plays audio when play button is pressed
VerseDetailPage pause audio when play button is pressed and audio is playing
VerseDetailPage stops audio when play button is pressed and audio is playing
VerseDetailPage logs error when loading audio fails
VerseDetailPage logs error when toggle button
VerseDetailPage should call stopAsync when audio playback finishes
VerseDetailPage should not call stopAsync when audio playback finishes
VerseDetailPage should not play audio when audio is not loaded and isAudioPlaying is false
VerseDetailPage logs error when unloading audio fails
VerseDetailPage should call replayAsync when play button is pressed and repeat button is toggled
Verse List Page displays the loading indicator when data is being fetched
Verse List Page displays an error message if there is an error
Verse List Page renders verse data when fetched successfully
Verse List Page should load arti true
Verse List Page should load arti false
Verse List Page navigates to another screen when a verse is pressed
Verse List Page fetches data successfully from an API
Verse List Page throws an error when the API call fails
Verse List Page renders default suratId(1) when it is absent
Verse List Page calls onRefresh function when reset button is pressed
Verse List Page clears input and shows an error alert if an invalid verse number is submitted
Verse List Page submits a valid verse number and navigates to the detail view
Verse List Page shows an error when an invalid (high) verse number is submitted and `jumlahAyat` is undefined
CustomDrawerContent renders profile information correctly
CustomDrawerContent navigates to ProfilePage on profile press
List Surah Component renders the page correctly
List Surah Component navigates to another screen when surah card is pressed
List Surah Component fetches Surah successfully
List Surah Component throws an error when the API call fails
List Surah Component functional search input
List Surah Component should set PopupStatus to true in AsyncStorage and hide popup when done
<SettingsPage /> renders correctly
<SettingsPage /> toggles Latin option correctly
<SettingsPage /> toggles Arti option correctly
<SettingsPage /> displays correct audio option modal
<SettingsPage /> should show Latin info on pressIn and hide on pressOut
<SettingsPage /> should show arti info on pressIn and hide on pressOut
<SettingsPage /> should show audio info on pressIn and hide on pressOut
<SettingsPage /> should close audio modal when pressed outside
AppNavigation opens drawer when menu button is pressed
Font is not loaded should render loading state when font is not loaded for errorPage
Font is not loaded should render loading state when font is not loaded for verseListPage
Font is not loaded should render loading state when font is not loaded for verseDetailPage
handles error when audio URI is undefined
PrevNextPositive navigates to next verse when next button is pressed
PrevNextPositive navigates to previous verse when previous button is pressed
VerseDetailPage should renders correctly initially
VerseDetailPage should toggle repeat state on button press
PrevNextPositive should not navigate to next verse when nomorAyat does not exist
PrevNextPositive should not navigate to previous verse when nomorAyat does not exist
CustomDrawerItem renders correctly
CustomDrawerItem navigates when clicked
CustomDrawerItem calls additional behaviour if provided when clicked
CustomDrawerItem does not throw error if additional behavior is not defined
ErrorPage renders correctly
ErrorPage calls resetError function when "Coba lagi" button is pressed
<ProfilePage /> renders profile page correctly

WelcomePage renders correctly

renders correctly

renders correctly
